app.description: An intelligent assistant that automatically summarizes subscribed channel content.

login.slogan: Stay caught up, without the catch.
login.forgot_password_desc: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
login.password_length_error: Password must be at least 8 characters
login.agree_error: Please agree to Terms and Privacy Policy
login.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
login.reset_link_sent: Password reset link sent to your email

hero.subtitle: An intelligent assistant that automatically summarizes your subscription content, keeping you up-to-date, saving time, and letting you focus on what matters most.

features.title: Why Choose CatchUp?
features.subtitle: Powerful features, simple experience, creating the best reading environment for you.

multi_platform.title: Multi-platform Integration
multi_platform.desc: Manage subscriptions from YouTube, Spotify, Firstory, and more in one place for efficient information retrieval.

real_time.title: Real-time Updates
real_time.desc: Automatically track channel updates and send notifications instantly so you never miss important info.

ai_summary.title: AI Smart Summary
ai_summary.desc: Use advanced AI to automatically generate content summaries, letting you grasp the key points of long videos in minutes.

smart_filter.title: Smart Filtering
smart_filter.desc: Powerful filtering tools to quickly find content you care about based on time, type, and keywords.

personal_notification.title: Personalized Notifications
personal_notification.desc: Fully customizable notification settings, only disturbing you when topics you truly care about are updated.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.desc: Enterprise-grade encryption to strictly protect your personal data and subscription habits.

how_it_works.title: How It Works
how_it_works.subtitle: Three simple steps to start your smart reading journey.

register.title: Register Account
register.desc: Quickly register with Email or social accounts to start your smart reading experience immediately.

connect.title: Connect Channels
connect.desc: Connect your favorite YouTube or Podcast channels in a few steps, supporting batch import.

enjoy.title: Enjoy Service
enjoy.desc: Sit back and relax, let AI organize the key points for you, and stay updated anytime, anywhere.

cta.title: Ready to boost efficiency?
cta.subtitle: Join tens of thousands of users and experience the information revolution brought by AI.

home.logout_confirm: Are you sure you want to logout?

footer.newsletter_desc: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest product updates and tech news.

subscription.title: Subscription Plans
subscription.subtitle: Choose the plan that suits you best

confirm.downgrade: Are you sure you want to downgrade to the free plan? You will lose current subscription features.

chat.welcome: Hello! I'm the AI assistant. I can answer any questions about this video. Feel free to ask!
